episode.title: Far Less Eloquent as You
episode.rawTitle: 98: ‘Far Less Eloquent as You’ With John Siracusa
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest John Siracusa returns to the show to discuss last week’s Apple event (introducing the iPad Air 2), and OS X Yosemite (and his review thereof).
episode.showNotes:
Special guest John Siracusa returns to the show to discuss last week’s Apple event (introducing the iPad Air 2), and OS X Yosemite (and his review thereof).

Sponsored by:

  • Casper: Premium mattresses for a fraction of the price.
  • Squarespace 7: Everything you need to create an exceptional website.
  • Backblaze: Unlimited, unthrottled online backup for Macs.

Links:

  • Siracusa’s Yosemite review.
  • Meta post about his Yosemite review.
  • ATP
  • Application Enhancer.
  • Quora thread on garbage collected systems (like Android) needing more RAM than non-GC systems (like iOS).
  • Daniel Jalkut on creating status bar icons that work with Yosemite’s dark menu bar.
  • FTL: WebKit’s LLVM based JIT.
  • Secrets: A database of hidden settings for Mac OS X.
  • Crystal Quest for Xbox.
